channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Markets didn’t know which way to go after Wednesday’s Fed rate cut. Expect more volatility ahead.
item.description: Investors didn’t know what to make of some of the Federal Reserve’s messaging on Wednesday. That could portend more volatility ahead.
